description: Defines the fields required to be configured on the users document for a user to be used as a Qubicle recipient.
name: Qubicle Recipient

qubicle.description: The configuration values for the Qubicle recipient
qubicle.name: Qubicle

enabled.description: Boolean to determine if the user is enabled for Qubicle
enabled.name: Enabled

pincode.description: The 4 digit pincode that can be used to perform actions for this recipient via Callflows
pincode.name: Qubicle Pincode

presence_id.description: A unique ID that will be used for presence updates when the status changes for the recipient
presence_id.name: Qubicle Presence Id
